title: In the South seas: palm and steeple
creator_credit: Gordon Babineau and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Interviews with foreign residents of the Solomon Islands provide a history of the involvement of plantation owners and Christian missions in the area. Contains very early footage of local customs. Narrated by George Woodcock.
